slides.title: Game Matrix
slides.body: A Game Recommendation Website consists of over 20,000 games to generate recommendations. Also get to know what other users are playing.

slides.title: Personal PortFolio
slides.body: My portfolio is a visual journey through my professional endeavors. It's a snapshot of the projects that define my expertise and creative vision. Explore, be inspired.

slides.title: Game Recommendation Model
slides.body: A Machine Leaning model built in python with the help of various libraries to recommend similiar games based on the input of the user.
